panes.title: Last Words
panes.subtitle: Final statements from the condemned in Texas

panes.paragraph: Texas keeps a database of the last words of its condemned. The following are the top fifty most common words for their final statments. Clicking on each bubble brings up a representative statement in full.

panes.title: Unusual Punishment
panes.subtitle: How a small minority of counties account for a vast majority of executions.

panes.paragraph: According to a study by the Death Penalty Information Center, roughly 10 percent of counties represent 90 percent of executions. Here is a map of the executions by county. Hovering on a county brings up more information.

panes.subtitle: A look at methods of execution from 1776 to present
